description: VANCOUVER – Mercedes-Benz Canada has put its four corporately owned Metro Vancouver dealerships up for sale. The German automaker directly owns 11 of its 59 Canadian stores, including two in Vancouver and two more in suburban Richmond and North Vancouver.
